description: As a bonding activity, and to add a little excitement to our normal routine, we participated in a VRTL Eats cooking class this month. We learned the art of creating delicious, homemade pizzas from Chef Jimmy and enjoyed a virtual party with our teammates – all via Zoom!
Sheba the Hug Pug turned 17 - or 119 in dog years - this month. She loved spending her big day celebrating with her humans and looks forward to an exciting year to come!
